title: Everyone is Busy with the assassin changes
body:
that they don't realise what riot is doing with the jungle, essentially going back to season 1 jungle

season 1: jungle has 120 sec respawn time, monsters give a lot of gold making junglers clearing the jungle and then ganking everywhere, still receiving a lot of gold.

season 2: "here at riot, we think that junglers should decide between clearing the jungle or ganking, so we reduced the respawn time to 90 sec while decreasing the gold, making junglers losing gold if they decide to lose time to do a gank"


season 7: -increased monsters respawn time to 150
-increased gold reward of camps

**Rito Dank Logic**


{{champion:64}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:59}}  
yup fun, can't wait for this meta to be back. getting pressured at lvl 3, while farming junglers are inferior, and junglers that need 6 being useless.

replies.body:
Plants, Harold, drag are all different from season 1. Also many many new Champs and items so I doubt the same Champs will perform in exactly the same way insomuch as to be boring.

You are probably right about early pressure being a bit more important, but I don't think that is too bad of a thing. Warwick is being reworked quite soon anyway and shyvana has been promised buffs, so that takes two delayed impact Champs out of the panic room. At least there will probably be more ganks in solo queue
